Maven Robotics - Onsite - Santa Clara, CA - Full time - Multiple Senior Positions - Seed stage

We are currently operating in stealth and are growing the world's best team in AI robotics. We are looking for self-starters that are the world's best in their field, who can innovate from a deep understanding of the fundamentals, and who share our values of unwavering truth seeking and integrity, humility, curiosity, and relentless determination.

We are looking to recruit for the following roles:

Motion Planning and Controls Engineer: https://www.mavenrobotics.ai/careers/role-2/ Machine Learning (AI/ML) Engineer - Robot Manipulation: https://www.mavenrobotics.ai/careers/role-3/ Modeling and Simulation Engineer - Robot Manipulation: https://www.mavenrobotics.ai/careers/role-4/ Software Engineer - DevOps and MLOps: https://www.mavenrobotics.ai/careers/role-5/ Mechanical Engineer - Robot Hardware Design: https://www.mavenrobotics.ai/careers/role-1/

If you're passionate and excited about AI robotics please submit your application on our website or contact info@mavenrobotics.ai
